name: Trial of the Alchemist
description:
After training to be an Alchemist for so long, you must accomplish one more task before you can be a full fledged Alchemist - explore an alternate realm to collect the four pieces of the Alchemist Orb and use it to escape.

Game Hints

  • Collect all orb pieces
  • Level up your alchemy to level 5
  • Create and then use the Alchemist Orb
  • Build up a stash of mana potions
  • Roughly 15 minutes long

Controls

  • A - move left
  • D - move right
  • Spacebar - jump
  • Left Mouse Button - Fire
  • Tab - Toggle Map
  • Escape - Options and Inventory Tabs
